unsolved: Building tiled displays with unmodified devices
use_cases_desc:
- Traveling Crickets (game with a virtual character that moves across displays when tapped behind)
- Dynamic Canvas (large tiled display)
- Tuneblock (music composer)
evaluation: User study (qualitative); Feedback gathered from an audience that has been presented with the three example apps
contribution_desc: Stitching displays together to a larger tiled display using pinch gestures (in analogy to Hinckley et al.'s Stitching)
tracking_characteristic: Identity; Location 2D; Location and relative orientation detected by pinch gesture; Relative location; Contact; Inside-out tracking
deployment: It was presented to an audience at conferences and exhibitions
contribution: Toolkit, middleware; Display stitching, larger tiled displays
